question: How do I set up my business in Bugal?
answer: Click your avatar (top right) → Business Settings. Complete business details including Banking — these flow into invoices and documents.

question: What happens after my 30‑day free trial ends?
answer: You can switch to the Free plan (up to 2 invoices/month): Avatar → Subscriptions → select Free.

question: How do I create a new organisation (e.g., for a new business)?
answer: Open the left menu → scroll to the Business icon → New Business. Then finish setup in Business Settings.

question: Can Bugal be used for Support Coordination?
answer: Yes. Many Support Coordinators create time‑block shifts for their activities, complete them, and invoice by client.

question: Is there a getting‑started video or guide?
answer: Yes — you'll receive an intro email with a video. We also have a Getting Started Guide and short courses.

question: I'm changing from a sole trader to a company — anything special to do?
answer: Pricing is per user (not entity). We recommend creating a new organisation for the company to keep tax records clear.

question: How do I create and send an invoice?
answer: 1) Mark shifts Completed → 2) Go to Invoices → choose the client → select shifts and any reclaimable expenses → Generate → Notify (arrow icon) to send.

question: How do I invoice the plan manager rather than the client?
answer: Edit the Client → Who will receive the invoices → add the Plan Manager's email and role. When sending, select them in the Notify list.

question: How do I mark an invoice as paid?
answer: Open the invoice → click … → $ → record the payment method and date. You can record full, partial, or write‑off.

question: I marked an invoice as paid by mistake. How do I undo it?
answer: Open the invoice → scroll to the bottom → Delete the receipt. Status reverts to Unpaid.

question: Why is my paid invoice still showing as overdue on the dashboard?
answer: Invoices must be marked as paid in Bugal (see above). This ensures the dashboard reflects the correct status.

question: Can I retrieve a deleted invoice?
answer: You can recreate it. The associated shifts automatically become available again to add to a new invoice.

question: Do NDIS item numbers auto‑populate invoice descriptions?
answer: No. Requirements vary across plan managers. Enter what works for your workflow; then Duplicate or set Recurring to reuse details.

question: Can I include shift notes or client addresses on invoices?
answer: Invoices intentionally exclude detailed shift notes and client addresses. Generate a Shift Report PDF and send it separately if required.

question: How do I add kilometres (KMs) to an invoice?
answer: Add KMs on the shift (car icon). When the shift is completed and invoiced, KMs are included automatically.

question: Why aren't my older shifts visible in the list?
answer: Clear filters (red dot near New Shift), set Status: Completed, optionally filter by Contact, then click Load More at the top for older items.

question: How do I edit a shift that has already been invoiced?
answer: Delete any payment on the invoice, then delete the invoice. Affected shifts will show Amend so you can edit, re‑complete, and re‑invoice.

question: Can I backdate shifts?
answer: Yes. Set the past date/time, confirm contact, category, and rate as needed, then mark Completed.

question: Does Bugal support clock‑in/clock‑out?
answer: Not currently. Adjust start/end to the nearest 15 minutes before completing the shift.

question: Can I issue quotes in Bugal?
answer: Not yet. Most users create a Service Agreement with a cost breakdown. Quoting is on our roadmap.

question: Can I create separate agreements for services like STA?
answer: Yes. Create additional Service Agreements with specific schedules, inclusions, and pricing for each service.

question: How do I upload a signed Service Agreement?
answer: Open the Service Agreement (in Draft) → click Complete → upload the signed PDF.

question: Can I change the Service Agreement cancellation policy?
answer: In‑app wording follows NDIS best practice and can't be edited. You can amend a PDF copy externally, then upload the signed version.

question: How do I generate and share shift notes?
answer: Go to Reports → Shift Reports, select date range and client, Generate and save as PDF. Share with clients, plan managers, or support coordinators as needed.

question: Is there incident reporting?
answer: No dedicated module yet. Record incidents in shift notes and include them in Shift Reports where appropriate.

question: How do I add staff?
answer: Avatar → Staff → New. Assign a role (Read Only, Junior, Senior, Admin). They'll receive an email invite.

question: Can staff enter shifts/KMs without seeing my financials?
answer: Today, even Junior roles can see some business data. Finer‑grained role permissions are in development.

question: My staff saw a referral code prompt — what is it?
answer: It's optional. They can leave it blank. If used and they later create a paid business, you get a referral credit.

question: Can I switch between monthly and annual payments?
answer: Yes. Avatar → Subscriptions → toggle Monthly/Yearly and pick your plan.

question: How do I cancel my subscription?
answer: We recommend downgrading to Free so you keep access to records for tax/audit. Do this under Subscriptions.

question: What does "2 per month" mean on the Free plan?
answer: You can send up to two invoices per calendar month on Free.

question: Can I transfer my subscription to a new company?
answer: Yes — contact us with the current and new business details and we'll guide the transfer.

question: I selected Annual by mistake — how do I switch to Monthly?
answer: Return to Subscriptions, select the Monthly plan, and proceed. If you hit issues, contact support.

question: Do I need a new plan when moving from Sole Trader to Company?
answer: No price change is needed. For clarity, we recommend a new organisation for the Company.

question: How do I change my password?
answer: Sign out → click Forgot your password? on the sign‑in page → follow the email link.

question: How do I update business name or address on invoices?
answer: Go to Business Settings → update details. Future invoices will reflect the changes.

question: How do I update banking details on invoices?
answer: Avatar → Business Settings → Banking section → save.

question: I can't sign in — what should I try?
answer: Try another browser/device or Incognito. Disable extensions or antivirus (e.g., Norton) temporarily. No outages? Contact us with details.

question: Desktop invoice issues but mobile works — why?
answer: Clear filters (see red dot near New Shift), click Load More, and confirm Plan Manager is set on the client's contact card.

question: Can I import data from other software?
answer: No automated import yet, but share your data and we'll assist where possible.

question: Does Bugal integrate with Xero/MYOB or include payroll?
answer: No payroll and no direct accounting integrations yet. Many users handle contractors via supplier invoices and reconcile with Shift Reports.

question: When will estimated income tax show on the dashboard?
answer: When recorded net income (income minus expenses) exceeds $18,200. If you expect it and don't see it, contact us.

question: Can I delete old clients?
answer: Not yet. An archive feature is planned to hide them from view while retaining history for reporting.

question: Where can I send feature requests?
answer: We love feedback. Tell us what would help your workflow and we'll prioritise accordingly.
